titles.title: To temporarily suspend the duty on N-((4-chlorophenyl)amino)carbonyl)-2-difluorobenzamide, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 5/12/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1998, the duty on: (1) N-(((4-chlorophenyl)- amino) carbonyl)-2-difluorobenzamide (diflubenzuron); and (2) mixtures of N-(((4-chlorophenyl) amino)-carbonyl)-2-difluorobenzamide (diflubenzuron) and inert substances.
